name: A173 - Appin - ITC 001 - G40 Clearing and Grubbing
template name: A173 - Appin - ITC 001 - G40 Clearing and Grubbing

name: • Confirm clearing limits with Principal and project arborist via site walk
• Identify limits of clearing by clearly visible markers
• Install all soil erosion and sedimentation controls required for the initial stage of construction
• Complete pre-clearing survey and survey report for flora and fauna prior to starting

• HP: Prior to clearing any area of work, submit Clearing and Grubbing Plan (Annexure G40/D) and report on the presence of weeds and unsound trees together with written notice that limits of clearing and areas of weed infestation identified in the ecological report (Clause 2.4(a)) are marked, at least seven days prior to starting clearing
